Baseado na engine do Half Life, essa continuação do Jogo Portal é bem similar ao primeiro, onde o personagem tem o controle de uma arma que lança portais interligados, que é usada para resolver puzzles. Cada puzzle resolvido te leva a um novo cenário. 
Nesta sequência a história do personagem é melhor desenvolvida e os puzzles realmente bons, mas como no primeiro ele é um pouco curto.
Contudo, por melhor que seja o modo single-player o que realmente brilha é o modo co-op, onde dois jogadores precisam trabalhar juntos para resolver os desafios.
O jogo conta também com a ajuda da comunidade, que pode desenvolver novos puzzles.

꼭 해보길 권합니다.

Mizahi bir anlatımla sunduğu hikayesi ve eğlenceli puzzle'larıyla türünün hakkını veren bir oyun.
Eğer İngilizce'niz iyiyse oynarken normalden çok daha fazla zevk alacaksınız. 
Wheatley gördüğüm en komik karakterlerden biri.
Puzzle'lar bazen uğraştırıcı ancak çok çok eğlenceli.
Kesinlikle öneriyorum.

If you haven't played this game yet then your're missing out.

The best and only in its field.

Smooth gameplay, intriguing atmosphere and depending on high you scored on the SAT, complex puzzles.

Stop reading reviews and buy it already.

[h1]TL;DR[/h1]
Incredible gameplay. Nice graphics. Good optimisation. Good story.

8/10
an improvement over Portal

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
This game's gameplay is really good. Its extremely innovative and creative. The puzzles were challenging but I managed. The mobility gel, hard light bridges and floaty tunnel things are nice additions to the already good gameplay of Portal. I found the game to get a bit boring at a point but that's probably because I played ~15 hours of portal games in the same week I played this game.

9/10

[h1]Graphics[/h1]
The graphics, like the last game, are simple but pleasing, but this time with a slight visual upgrade. The optimisation is godlike and allows the game to be run on low (which still looks good) at 1080p 60fps on integrated graphics.

8/10

[h1]Story[/h1]

The story is pretty good but not amazing with some very funny humor dotted all over the place. 

8/10 because GLaDOS is a potato.

A great game overall. The story is phenominal with many likeable characters and some suprising twists. Furthermore, the level designs are amazing and clever and use a variety of different mechanics and aesthetics to create challenging, yet never frustrating puzzles. This is an absolute must-have for any PC gamer and i would definitely reccomend it.

Como experiencia Co-op creo que es lo mejor!!. La curva de dificultad es perfecta, y el diseño de niveles es impresionante. Tras completar el juego y las fases extras del modo co-op con un colega nos hemos quedado con ganas de más y lo hemos flipado con la cantidad de mapas que hay en la Workshop, para echar horas hasta el infinito. Ser digna secuela de uno de los mejores juegos de la historia es un papelón, y la verdad es que Portal 2 lo consigue

Divertido y adictivo. Con una ambientación espectacular y una jugabilidad increíble. Es un juego obligado para todo tipo de gamer, desde el casual hasta el "pro", incluso aunque no le guste el género puzzle.

Uno de los mejores juegos de Valve, que ya es decir mucho, y una obra de arte.

Si bien haber jugado a la primera parte permite introducirse mejor en la trama,  tampoco es fundamental.

É um jogo de raciocínio. Pessoas que curtem FPS comuns talvez não curtam Portal 2, pois demanda muito raciocínio lógico e muitas vezes você fica muito tempo parado em um mesmo Puzzle. 
Me surpreendo como a Valve conseguiu colocar tanta ação em um jogo de raciocínio. Personagens bem feitos, dublagem bem feita e um final com bastante humor. 
As partes das instalações da parte 7 são um pouco chatinhas, mas de resto, os cenários são muito imersivos.
Recomendo bastante pra quem gosta de queimar a cabeça. :)
Хорошая игра с хорошим сюжетом и отличным геймплеем.

This game is really something else, man. As someone who hasn't played THAT many games in my life, this one is certainly up there on some of the best. I love seeing references to this game, and will go out of my way for Portal related content.

Although graphics may be outdated compared to today's quality, it doesn't take away from the storyline, jokes, and puzzle quality of the overall game. 
I recently did the Co-op mode with a friend and had an absolute blast, with crazy good multiplayer availability if you have the means to communicate well.

As an older game designed for older computers, low end PC's can handle it easily, and the visual aspect can be enhanced well using "Reshade"

In my opnoin, this game is the best modern video game that has ever been crafted by human beings. 
If you are looking to buy a good game, buy this one.
It was fun while it lasted

Is this game good? Does a bear crap in the woods? This game is great, I really love solving the different test chambers throughout the whole game. The gameplay is so much more fluient than portal 1 was, the story is top of the line for sure. I love this game, no way I wouldnt recomend it to anyone. Solid 10/10 I have 0 complaints except the ending. My only complaint with the ending is its TOO GOOD, UGH, I want more. I want portal 3, but I am slowly realizing that I will probably never get it, and you know what? That hurts, it fucking hurts. The ending hit me like a freight train, just bam, I just sat there in awe. Portal 3 please valve :). If you are playing this I higly recomend following the story and reading the comic Portal 2 Lab Rat. BUY THE GAME!!!

This game is and always will be a classic in my mind. The story was a very relevant piece in the game, more so than the previous installement. The story, the game mechanics, makes this game a masterpiece. If you havem't played this game. PLAY IT.

Obra maestra digna de pasar a los anales de la historia de la cultura universal. Trama y guión sobresalientes, mecánicas frescas que no envejecen por muchos años que pasen. Además, incluye una campaña cooperativa que es una delicia.
Si lo ves rebajado, ni te lo pienses, vas a disfrutar cada segundo de juego.

Extrem gutes und unterhaltsames Spiel. Durch eine lange Kampagne und einen Multiplayer sowie auch Community Karten wird dieses Spiel nie langweilig. Es ist geeignet für Leute, die gerne Tüfteln und rätseln. Am Anfang erscheint das Spiel noch recht leicht aber zum Schluss hin wird es immer schwerer. Ich habe viele aha Momente gehabt, bei denen ich mir nur an den Kopf gepackt habe und dachte wie ich diese Möglichkeit nur übersehen konnte. Dennoch finde ich es sehr schade, dass dieses Spiel die Reihe beendet. Ich hätte mir mehr Teile gewünscht. Ich für meinen Teil kann das Produkt nur weiter empfehlen. Allerdings würde ich mit dem Kauf bis zu einem Sale warten, da es bei einem solchen auf einen Euro heruntergesetzt wird. Dennoch ist der Preis von 20€ auf jeden Fall gerechtfertigt. Von mir 5 Sterne.

Five out of five stars. Solid, satisfying mechanics, a great soundtrack, pleasing graphics, a fun story, and exceptionally memorable characters. Did I mention that the puzzles actually gave me mutliple headaches? It's just a good time. Granted, it is a touch short but still totally worth the price of admission.

Лучшая игра на прохождение в которую я играл! Концовка очень зацепила. Хочется оказатся в Aperture Science в живую (в нормальное время)! Очень душевно! Вообщем круто!

Плюсы: 
+ Крутой сюжет!
+ Сложные головоломки!
+ Игра не дает о себе забыть даже после прохождения (Co-Op, редактор карт)
+ Редактор карт (Каждый может почувствовать себя GlaDOS, сделать свою камеру и дать поиграть в нее игрокам через WorkShop.
+ Нет катсцен (Все в стиле Valve как и в халфе катсцен нет и все повествование происходит персонажем в самой игре)

Минусы: 
- Загрузки (они постоянно)
- Сложные головоломки (Да это был и плюс. Но правда, некоторые игроки привыкшие к слабеньким головоломкам современных игр аля: "поставь куб туда и дверь откроется" могут сильно бомбануть и выключить игру на 4ой главе.
- Плохая озвучка на русском. (Иногда не совпадает с субтитрами, ну и перевод в целом)
- Бесят моменты (особенно к середине игры) когда нужно в огромном зале найти маленькую стенку куда нужно поставить портал. Это очень маленькие стенки! И я часто тупил на таких моментах.

Отличная игра! Можно пройти за вечер и получить кучу удовольствия!

P.S Рекомендую перед прохождением второй части пройти (или просто ознакомится с сюжетом первой) ибо ничего не будет понятно.

Portal 2 неплохая головоломка и с хорошим сюжетом.В данной игре мы должны проходить всякие головоломки с помощью портальной пушки которая создаёт порталы ,а также в этой игре есть кооперативный режим с довольно неплохим сюжетом .
Прошёл игру 3 раза и не пожалел потраченого времени.Рекомендую
gg inget våld ;-)
Worth it. Absolutely!

Counter Strike'da kanser olduktan sonra stres atmak için girerim diye almıştım, öğrendim ki daha çok kanser olunuyormuş. Fakat ne olursa olsun, o bölümleri geçmenin verdiği haz ve mutluluk çok fazla. Yarım saat diye girip, 3 saatimi harcadığım muazzam bir oyun. Zekasına güvenen hiç düşünmeden alsın derim.

One of the most interesting, funny and flushed out games ever. It's universal praise is well-deserved, it's appeal spans across different ages and demographics. The game has the best difficulty curve I've ever experienced.

It's never dull, it's never obvious, and I feel satisfied and happy with myself whenever I completed a level.
It's also never too hard, it's intuitive enough that whether you look at it and think about it for a while or just dive in head first trying to figure out a puzzle along the way it is possible to solve it in a relatively short amount of time.

I haven't played through the whole multiplayer campaign, but I have beaten the singleplayer one.

The level design is top notch. It runs well. It's designed well. It looks great and it is superbly written.

I have no idea how the game could've been made any better without having severe compromises.

I highly reccomend it for everyone, it is one games I would show to someone to introduce them to gaming, to show them how great games can be.
